name: AQ-Slug 12ga 422gr (25 per kit)
description: Self-rifling AQ-Slug in 12 gauge, 422-grain lead ball with nylon fin. Known for accuracy and reliability.

properties.notes: Made in USA, recommended gas seals: X12X, FS12, BPGS, X12X, XF12

name: Thug Slug 12ga 1oz (25/pak)
description: Hard-hitting, flat-nosed Thug Slug. Suitable for both smoothbore and rifled barrels. Roll or fold crimp.

properties.notes: One-piece design with double-reinforced gas seal. Made in Italy.

name: Thug Slug 12ga 1-1/8oz (25/pak)
description: Hard-hitting, flat-nosed Thug Slug for 12 gauge. Extra payload for increased knockdown power.

properties.notes: Use roll/fold crimp data in Slug Manual. Ideal in both smoothbore and rifled shotguns.

name: Thug Slug 20ga 7/8oz (25/pak)
description: Thug Slug design for 20 gauge. Delivers tight groupings and hard hits in both smooth and rifled barrels.

properties.notes: Unitized one-piece design, quad-buckle cushion. Made in Italy.

name: Thug Slug .410 127gr (25/pak)
description: Thug Slug .410 offering with 127 grains. Engineered for smooth feeding and strong impact.

properties.notes: Ballistic lab sees success in .410 handguns. Good for small-bore slug applications.

name: LBC Sabot Slug 12ga (25/pak)
description: Segmented LBC Sabot with cushion section. Shock-absorbing design for improved load velocity and consistency.

properties.notes: 355-grain spire point + 82-grain molded carrier. Overall slug length ~0.894".

name: DGS12 Slug 12ga (25/pak)
description: Dangerous Game Slug in 12 gauge, single-unit wad/slug with self-adjusting column height for perfect crimps.

properties.notes: Gas seal ~.735, slug diameter ~.731, length ~1.870". Ideal for big game.

name: DGS16 Slug 16ga (25/pak)
description: Dangerous Game Slug in 16 gauge. Delivers balanced downrange energy and excellent accuracy.

properties.notes: Gas seal ~.680, slug ~.668, length ~1.842". Single-unit design.

name: DGS20 Slug 20ga (25/pak)
description: Dangerous Game Slug in 20 gauge. Enhanced velocity with controlled expansion, even in smoothbore barrels.

properties.notes: Gas seal ~.638, slug ~.623, length ~1.825". Perfect for lighter big-game loads.

name: DGS Thunderbolt Slug 12ga 1-3/8 oz (10/pak)
description: High-power Thunderbolt Slug for big game. 1-3/8 oz lead projectile for strong stopping power.

properties.notes: Designed for 3" and 3.5" chambers, cylinder choke recommended.

name: DGS Gualbo Steel Slug 12ga (10/pak)
description: Expanding Gualbo Steel Slug 12ga (32g). Petals peel back on impact for devastating wound channel.

properties.notes: Central plug ensures stability and precision. Plastic body with lateral tongues.
